lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The May 11-13 ministerial meeting of the 24-nation OECD, a forum for coordinating economic policies, has taken on added significance in view of the difficulties dogging the attempts of major nations to achieve joint goals.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The Reagan administration, this week facing the prospect of a tough trade bill aimed at curbing foreign trade surpluses, also promised to fight protectionism.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: If faster German growth fails to emerge, Bonn could find itself under pressure to speed up tax cuts planned for early 1988 when leaders of the seven meet in Venice this June.
